name: Home Laundry Girl Game
description:
Have you ever tried washing your clothes when mommy’s not home?

Have the experience of your own kids laundry to clean up dirty dresses. All the kids have gone messy playing around in dirt, painting pictures or having different home adventures. Naughty kids usually spend time playing in mud and dirt when mom’s not home. Oh NO! Its mess everywhere. Mom will be home anytime so let’s be the little laundry kid to wash all the dirty clothes and be your mommy’s little helper to take care of home. This is a washing machine game for kids to learn how to wash clothes.

Clothes Washing, Drying & Steaming
Get ready to wash your clothes. Be your mommy’s little helper. Have the washing machine experience to wash and clean the messy clothes at the baby kids laundry. Dry your clothes in bright sunlight and let’s steam them in the electronic steaming machine.


Dress Up
Let’s dress up and become a clean and handsome kid before your mom gets home. You can choose your favorite dress and look pretty.


Baby Kids Feed & Play
Go through the story modes of all 4 kids. Play outdoors, play with toys, feed them with food like burgers, pizza and design a painting with kids painting adventures.


FEATURES
4 kids with different gameplay stories
Cloth washing, Drying, Steaming and Dress Up
Machine Washing Experience for girls
Interactive sounds, Fun gameplay for kids
